DOC.brief_summary: Physical inactivity health problem affect people worldwide identify fourth large risk factor overall mortality ( contribute 6 % death globally ) . Many researcher try increase physical activity ( PA ) level traditional method without much success . Thus , many researcher turn mobile technology emerge method change health behaviours.The study consist physical activity intervention mobile application elderly . The study 3x2 model , sample distribute three study group ( 53 year ) evaluate 10 week baseline .
DOC.brief_title: Prescription Physical Exercise Through Mobile Application Elderly
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives study : - Evaluate effectiveness physical exercise program 10 week improve fitness , cardiovascular , anthropometric body composition parameter people 53 year . - Examine effect exercise intervention deliver mobile application ( WhatsApp ) fitness , cardiovascular risk factor , anthropometric body composition people 53 year . Hypotheses study : - An intervention exercise administer via mobile application ( WhatsApp ) effective reduce cardiovascular risk factor people 53 year . - An intervention exercise administer via mobile application ( WhatsApp ) effective increase physical fitness people 53 year . - An intervention exercise administer via mobile application ( WhatsApp ) effective reduce BMI , percent body fat ; increase percentage muscle mass people 53 year . - 10-weeks face-to-face intervention physical exercise obtain great improvement fitness parameter intervention deliver via mobile application people 53 year . - 10-weeks face-to-face intervention physical exercise obtain great improvement anthropometric body composition intervention deliver via mobile application people 53 year .
DOC.criteria: Have mobile phone Internet Be clinically stable Be able perform physical activity Be able understand complete inform consent Ability cope assessment test Unable perform physical activity Have acute chronic disease Have medical condition physical problem need special attention ( history fracture upper low limb , dementia , psychological problem , neuromuscular disease , history myocardial infarction , osteoporosis , cancer , diabetes ) .
